Keywords: Maximum Carnage , Monster , Mystical
Real Name: Jason Macendale
Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Secret Identity
PUMPKIN BOMBS: Demogoblin may start the game with [SVC] #s001 Pumpkin Bombs equipped (at no cost).
DESTROY THE NON-BELIEVERS: Precision Strike. // FREE: Chose one: [Improved Targeting: Once per range attack, this character can draw a line of fire through one piece of Blocking terrain. Immediately after the attack resolves, destroy that piece of Blocking terrain.], [Improved Targeting: Characters], [Improved Targeting: Elevated], or [Improved Targeting: Hindering]. Demogoblin can use the chosen ability this turn.

July 9, 2021
TheHobgoblin95
[QUOTE=ClixCommand3r;12146036]It relates to the secret identity mechanic. Check out Jason Macendale's card: SECRET IDENTITY: DEMOGOBLIN, HOBGOBLIN, JACK O'LANTERN: When Jason Macendale would be KO'd, you may instead replace him with a Secret Identity character with a listed name on click #9. This game, when that replacement is KO'd, it scores this character's points and an additional 25 points.[/QUOTE] Thank you! Much appreciated
July 8, 2021
ClixCommand3r
It relates to the secret identity mechanic. Check out Jason Macendale's card: SECRET IDENTITY: DEMOGOBLIN, HOBGOBLIN, JACK O'LANTERN: When Jason Macendale would be KO'd, you may instead replace him with a Secret Identity character with a listed name on click #9. This game, when that replacement is KO'd, it scores this character's points and an additional 25 points.

June 5, 2021
nelson2208
Pumpkin bombs are great on Demogoblin and knockback can really break up opponent's formation. Also his glider is on fire!!......that's pretty cool....
September 24, 2020
ArkhamInquirer
For some reason, when I look at Demogoblin here, I find myself wanting... [I]more[/I]. Maybe it's just because I'm a big Maximum Carnage fan. That being said, what you get for 60 points is great: he's a very very competent and versatile ranged attacker, and more importantly, a flier for Maximum Carnage. If he gets slammed, he's going to crumple quick, but having the Defend and Prob back dial is kind of nifty. He transitions from a secondary attacker to a nice little support piece. I suppose my only thing is that I wish they'd given him one more click, or bumped a combat value here or there, just to tack on an extra 5-10 points. That's just me being picky though.
September 21, 2020
Bat-Phreak
A much needed ranged attacker for Maximum Carnage. All the IT options make Jason even more effective. Nice trick: Demogoblin can use IT: Blocking to target a wall or square of blocking drawing LOF through a different wall or square of blocking, thereby destroying 2-pcs of Blocking terrain. This can help a brawler Maximum Carnage figure (I'm looking at you Absolute Carnage w/ your Flurry and Giant Reach: 3) do one of those classic "Here's Johnny!" moments on some unsuspecting opponent.
